perturbation.original_text:
1.1     "Spinrecords.com Brand Features" means the SpinRecords.com name and
logo  and  other  trademarks,  trade  names  and service names including but not
limited  to  those set forth on Exhibit A attached hereto and incorporated herein
                               ---------
by  reference  and  all  Intellectual  Property  Rights  related  thereto.
SpinRecords.com  Brand  Features  shall include any derivatives, improvements or
modifications  thereto  or  thereof and any Intellectual Property rights related
thereto.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.1     "Spinrecords.com Brand Features" means the SpinRecords.com name and
logo  and  other  trademarks,  trade  names  and service names including but not
limited  to  those set forth on Exhibit A attached hereto and incorporated herein
                               ---------
by  reference  and  all  Intellectual  Property  Rights  related  thereto.
SpinRecords.com  Brand  Features shall only include the name and logo. Any derivatives, improvements or modifications shall not be considered SpinRecords.com Brand Features unless explicitly agreed upon in writing by both parties.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines SpinRecords.com Brand Features to include derivatives, improvements, or modifications. The modified version contradicts this by stating that derivatives, improvements, or modifications are NOT included unless explicitly agreed upon. This creates uncertainty about the scope of 'SpinRecords.com Brand Features' and the associated rights and obligations.

perturbation.original_text:
3.1     Licenses  by  NETTAXI  to SpinRecords.com. NETTAXI hereby grants to
             -----------------------------------------
SpinRecords.com  a non-exclusive, worldwide, nontransferable, revocable, royalty
free  license to use the NETTAXI Brand Features as the same may be modified from
time  to  time  for  the  purposes  of  this  Agreement
perturbation.changed_text:
3.1     Licenses  by  NETTAXI  to SpinRecords.com. NETTAXI hereby grants to
             -----------------------------------------
SpinRecords.com  a non-exclusive, worldwide, transferable, irrevocable, royalty bearing
free  license to use the NETTAXI Brand Features as the same may be modified from
time  to  time  for  the  purposes  of  this  Agreement
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the license granted by NETTAXI to SpinRecords.com is non-transferable, revocable and royalty free. The modified version contradicts this by stating that the license is transferable, irrevocable and royalty bearing. This creates a direct contradiction, making it unclear what the actual terms of the license are.

perturbation.original_text:
8.1     Term  of  Agreement.  This  Agreement  shall  be effective upon the
             ------------------
Effective Date and shall remain in force for a period of one (1) year, and shall
be automatically renewed for successive periods of one (1) year unless otherwise
terminated  as provided  herein.
     8.2     Convenience.  NETTAXI  may terminate this Agreement at any time for
             -----------
perturbation.changed_text:
8.1     Term  of  Agreement.  This  Agreement  shall  be effective upon the
             ------------------
Effective Date and shall remain in force for a period of one (1) year, and shall
not be renewed under any circumstances and will immediately become void after a period of one (1) year, unless otherwise
terminated  as provided  herein.
     8.2     Convenience.  NETTAXI  may terminate this Agreement at any time for
             -----------
perturbation.explanation: Section 8.1 originally states that the agreement auto-renews unless terminated as provided in the agreement. Now, section 8.1 states that the agreement won't be renewed under any circumstance and section 8.2 provides one of the reasons that termination is possible. This creates uncertainty about the term of agreement.
